column5: Though id share this small report with you guys.  We decided to hit a VERRRY small lake. were i knew there was pike and bass.  the plan was to hit it in the A.M.  good thing we did.......  the day starts of with me hitting a fair 3 lbs pike.    then one of my buddies tip-up goes down....... SLOWLY.... B.A.S.S!    his first ever on ice!  winds picking up and my girl-friend (stephanie) keeps complainning.  but this time she was going to warm up.  a tip-up goes down and its her turn to grab it. RUN!!!  she sets the hook like a pro and what seems to be a small bite ends up beeing a real nice fight!.....  well let me tell you folks she fought this pike like a pro... it took 3-4 runs and she let the slack go . didnt horse it in NOTHING!  BANG she lands it!      A serriouse 5.6 lbs pike ! her PB on the ice!  from this point the bite slows down .....  a couple more bass action kept us busy tho.    mike with his dinner.    STIFFY!    TWAS a nice day to be out with the ''WIFE'' and friends.  all fish were kept for tonights FEAST!  we cought some fish but the biggest thing we cought today was a........SUNBURN BABY!!!!!!!!!!!!!  hope you enjoi the report!               P.S :  How did a summer pictures get there!
congrats on the gfriend pb. it is still really odd seing bass while ice fishing.
Interesting.   Are winter bass legal there?
nice fishin..you guys must be the first people to say a chunky little pike like that is only 3lbs  , it's really probably bigger than that..even a nice chunky 26 incher for example is pushing 5-7 lbs
Yep ,The season closes March 31st in Quebec...      Nice pike for Stephanie ......BTW    :thumbsup_anim:
Nice going.  Small mouth are just as tasty as walleye or perch to my taste buds.  Enjoy.
Great report and pics Kevin!!!  Looks like a fun day, and congrats to Stephanie on that very nice PB Pike!!!
looks like fun, but that first pike was only 3 pounds???  looks like my scale may be broken if thats the case i would of guessed that being much heavier.  cheers!
I'm usually the first to criticize ppl on exaggerating the size of their fish, but those pike look to be bigger than you stated.
Nice report, Thanks for sharing. Your killin me with the bass shots. Only 5 months to go here till we can catch em.........I cant wait ! nice pike too
Looks like a great day out there with your friends and GF.
Great report and pics Kevin  Looks like you guys had a great time out there Congratulations to Stephanie for her PB     Beautiful gator  Thanks for sharing Jacques
Great stuff...i would say it looked fun...BUT I CANT SEE THE PICS  As for GFs outfishing you....lol....it gets worse if you ever marry them....ooooops...did i just use the 'M' word.....lol
I agree that the pike you caught was heavier than 3 lbs., probably 4.5 at best. Nice fish your GF caught, and also nice sized bass. That sure is going to be a nice meal. Thanks for the report.
Great report... get used to the GF outfishing you...   then when you get used to that.. have kids and they will outfish you....

Thanx for all the great comments guys!   hard to believe but the pike my GF is holding is indeed 5.4 lbs on the digital scale!  the first one im holding was 3.2.............................. so lets say 3 lbs!  this week end was great ,hope everybody went outside to catch some RAYZZZZZZ!  my buddies told me that the pike was AWESOME!  and the bass had a couple of worms but they dont mind that they cook them and eat the added protein.....  those pike look big cause we pull them outward arms extended .... and but the cam reel close to the fish !  thanx again and till next time...
nice lookin day on the water Kevin, those smallies are nice lookin and the pb pike is great for her!
